cons: Jujube might lower blood sugar so monitor your blood sugar closely if you have diabetes.

name: Jujube
pros: Jujubes and their seeds are commonly used in Chinese medicine to treat common sleep troubles like insomnia.

Impressive ability to kill off tumor cells, making jujube fruit a potential cancer-fighting food.

Jujube’s high saponin content that gives it the ability to act as a natural sedative and have a soothing effect on the entire nervous system and restful night’s sleep and help treat insomnia without drugs.
